description: Shopee Open Platform documentation page introducing the platform and its capabilities

platform_features.name: Powerful APIs
platform_features.description: Access to Open APIs for orders, products, marketing with push notification services

platform_features.name: Developer Services
platform_features.description: End-to-end developer support including onboarding, APP development, testing, release, and maintenance

platform_features.name: Testing Tools
platform_features.description: Access to Open API testing tools, test accounts and sandbox testing environments

user_types.description: Comprehensive range of Open APIs for Shopee's ecommerce processes
For sellers who want to develop custom software and integrate systems

notes: This appears to be an introduction page rather than a specific API endpoint documentation. It contains general information about the Shopee Open Platform, its benefits, and who can access it. The page includes a navigation menu on the left showing various API documentation sections including Getting Started, API Best Practices, and specific API integration guides.
